title: Black Friday merchandise sale?
body: I was planning on buying some figures from the merch store and was wondering if anything is going to be going on sale soon. I heard there is supposed to be an announcement tomorrow (Monday)  but I can't find any information on it.

replies.body:
They'll let us know all about it Monday :) It's so exciting!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
I suppose I'll just have to wait. I was planning on getting the Bard figure since they were low in stock but if I can get a better deal tomorrow that'd be great.

I don't have all of that info myself yet tbh, they don't trust us sneaky poros with merch details for obvious reason xD!

I diiiiiid notice that our [**Facebook Merch page**](https://www.facebook.com/RiotGamesMerch/) has been steadily keeping people updated! Looks like Monday around 11am we're getting more info!
HAHA got 4! Debating on getting Meowkai...
Thanks, I didn't even know about the facebook page. 11 am I'll be ready!
